channel.title: venv on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in venv on Memo Tut

item.title: Use jupyter-lab installed in python virtual environment (venv)
item.description: There was already a post on Qiita, but the information was scattered, so I arranged it. There are two points. Use kernel installed in virtual environment Add a virtual environment to the execution environment (python) path It’s obvious if you understand it, but often you install it in the original environment without checking it. environment MacOS 10.15.1 python 3.7.4 (pyenv/anyenv) Create virtual environment The module that creates the virtual environment is assumed to be installed.
